channel.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?
channel.description:
Like most people i have formed a theory about Gman. I don't really think he's evil or the illuminati, but I kind of think that he's a good guy that's guiding some of the main characters through events (Eli, Gordon, Alyx and so on). Perhaps he is an agent for some government where they don't really get out much and have formed many varieties of speech disorder.:freeman:
But seriously I think he's a good/neutral guy who's just trying to use the main characters as figures to save humanity and create hope for the people.
Thoughts on this theory welcome.

item.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
I think that they used the green eyes on Gman in hl2 (cause hl1 any1 had coloured eyes except assassins [when killed from the back while they were moving the eyes will be shown]) after searching for eye colours of the characters and they saw the textures of Gordan. “Oh look let’s use the eyes of Gordon Freeman and problem solved. Any1 will care.”

item.description:
DarkSoroush:

But they are

I wasn’t implying that the statement was false, but it’s a non sequitur. I know two people with green eyes. Maybe one of them is the other person… from the FUTURE!

item.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Thispings my sarcasm detector:

Doug Lombardi:

We’re gonna wrap it all up, put a bow on it - the G-Man is Gordon’s father… it’s all good.

G-man Revealed:

Chet Faliszek:

will let you in on a little secret.

The gnome gets caught in a radiation storm and travels in time… he comes back in HL1 - yeah, that’s right, HE IS THE GMAN.

But shhh… don’t tell anyone.

thanks

Chet

:retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?
item.dc:creator: DarkSoroush
item.description:
I seem to recall Valve saying something like the G-man and Gordon were not related and not the same person.

Oops?! Really?! I didn’t hear it before!

There are a lot of problem in this opinion. I know! as i said before, HL1 has a lot of them! If you remember what Nihilanth said before dying: “You are Man, He is not Man” i think. Or something like that!
Any way it was an idea! A lot of people still believe in it. I am not, but always there is a maybe!

How if G-Man is someone from an other “parallel world”/“planet” want to reduce combines power with use of us!? I heard it long time ago from some one! An other maybe.

Read full topic

item.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?

item.description:
^ they did? I didn’t know it but anyways I’ve been always partidary (is this how is wrote? partidary?) of the fact that gordan and gman aren’t the same person.

item.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?
item.dc:creator: DarkSoroush
item.description:
THEY BOTH HAVE GREEN EYES?

STOP. EVERYTHING.

But they are:
https://i73.photobucket.com/albums/i207/InuYashahalfdemon/Halflife/gordon_freeman_big.gif
https://www.techreviewer.com/content/reviews/hl2/03_gman.jpg

they are not the same person. Lips + widows peak are different, for example.

Gordon has beard. And g-man not, So we can’t say any thing about lips 100%.
But about widow’s peak, I think they are much like each other. Take a look. Style of widow’s peak are same. But we can’t forgot that g-man is older then Gordon.
Even if you check g-man’s nose you can see maybe effect of using “glasses”. Funny.
G-MAN : GORDON FREEMAN

gman doesn’t have beard

I don’t think it is serious different.

I am not fan of this idea, But it is possible.

Sorry about english!

Read full topic

item.title: Gman; Saviour of earth?
item.dc:creator: DarkSoroush
item.description:
They are more like each other then different.
Do you ever notified that they both have “green” eyes?!

where are his glasses

I don’t think it is serious different.

why is he black haired now

Hmm, Maybe a different!

where is his HEV suit

HEV suit, Do you think that Gordon need HEV suit in future?! HEV suit is only a protection.

and why he has powers?

I don’t know. Maybe EP3! Maybe HL3! It is about future and nobody know about it except Valve and God.

and why does he look completely different?

Not too much, Take a look at this OLD picture:
https://m.blog.hu/ga/garrysmod/image/freeman_gman2.jpg

And why does he speak? And have trouble speaking.

And i ask an other question! Why Gordon never speaks?!

I am not fan of this idea, But it is possible.

Read full topic

item.description:
Dooooctoorrrrrr Freeeeemannnnnn, I realize this cck, may not be the most…conveniant—for a fcker(or fg), buhht… I had t-shit. Your (fag) Fggot (fcking) friends were otherwise…occ-upied…There was a time…they cared nothing for…fcking… Ms. Vance…when their only ex-perience of fcking was a crow–barrr. When I fcked her, in White Forest…I acted in the face of objection; she was a mere fcking (fag) child, and of no practical use…to anyoneeee…I have learned to ig.nore such naysayers when fcking them…hm?..was out of the question…Still!..I am not one to…fck my-invest-ments…and I remain confident she was worth far more than the initial fck…That’s why I must now…ex-traaaCT(emphasis)…from you! some small shit owed…for your own cck (shit?)… I slightbreath whish I could do more than fck you > , but I have agreed to abide by cer-tain–sh*t…Well…now…f-uh-ing…listen carefully my dear…when you see your…f-uh-ing father (almost sarcastically), relay…these…f-uh-ing words…breathe!
